CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 25, 1966, pg. 1B, reads: "The Clementes - Vera and Roberto Clemente, with little Roberto Jr., typify the ideal American family. They divide their time between any apartment in East Liberty and their home in Puerto Rico.  The picture on the left was made by Clemente.  It is his favorite hobby. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Vera Clemente, Roberto Clemente, and their son Roberto Clemente Jr., seated on chair in their apartment in East Liberty
